A

areCompatibleBuffers(BufferedImage, BufferedImage) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.image.BufferedImages
Checks if the given two BufferedImage instances have the same dimension (width and height) and are of the same type (BufferedImage.getType()).

B

BufferedImages - Class in org.jtrim2.image
Contains static utility methods for create new BufferedImages and retrieving some properties of them.

C

cloneImage(BufferedImage) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.image.BufferedImages
Returns a new BufferedImage which is the copy of the specified image.
createAcceleratedBuffer(BufferedImage) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.image.BufferedImages
Returns an image which have the same pixels as the specified image but is likely to be accelerated by the currently present graphics card (if there is any).
createCompatibleBuffer(BufferedImage, int, int) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.image.BufferedImages
Creates a returns a new BufferedImage which is compatible with the specified BufferedImage with the given dimensions.
createNewAcceleratedBuffer(BufferedImage) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.image.BufferedImages
Returns a new image which have the same pixels as the specified image but is likely to be accelerated by the currently present graphics card (if there is any).
createNewOptimizedBuffer(BufferedImage) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.image.BufferedImages
Returns a new image which have the same pixels as the specified image but is likely to be more efficiently handled than the one specified.
createOptimizedBuffer(BufferedImage) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.image.BufferedImages
Returns an image which have the same pixels as the specified image but is likely to be more efficiently handled than the one specified.

G

getApproxMemorySize() - Method in class org.jtrim2.image.ImageResult
Returns the approximate size of memory in bytes, the image of this ImageResult retains.
getApproxSize(BufferedImage) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.image.BufferedImages
Returns the approximate memory in bytes the specified BufferedImage retains.
getCompatibleBufferType(ColorModel) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.image.BufferedImages
Returns the type of the BufferedImage which most closely approximates the specified ColorModel.
getHeight() - Method in class org.jtrim2.image.ImageMetaData
Returns the height in number of pixels whose meta data is this ImageMetaData.
getHeight() - Method in class org.jtrim2.image.ImageResult
Returns the height of the image or -1 if it is unknown.
getIioMetaData() - Method in class org.jtrim2.image.JavaIIOMetaData
Returns the IIOMetadata as provided by the ImageIO library of Java.
getImage() - Method in class org.jtrim2.image.ImageResult
Returns the retrieved image.
getMetaData() - Method in class org.jtrim2.image.ImageResult
Returns the meta data information of the image.
getStoredPixelSize(ColorModel) - Static method in class org.jtrim2.image.BufferedImages
Returns the average size in bytes of a single pixel in the given ColorModel.
getWidth() - Method in class org.jtrim2.image.ImageMetaData
Returns the width in number of pixels whose meta data is this ImageMetaData.
getWidth() - Method in class org.jtrim2.image.ImageResult
Returns the width of the image or -1 if it is unknown.

I

ImageMetaData - Class in org.jtrim2.image
Defines a base class for the meta data of an image.
ImageMetaData(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class org.jtrim2.image.ImageMetaData
Initializes the ImageMetaData with the specified properties.
ImageResult - Class in org.jtrim2.image
Defines an image which was retrieved from an external source.
ImageResult(BufferedImage, ImageMetaData) - Constructor for class org.jtrim2.image.ImageResult
Initializes the ImageResult with the given image and its meta data.
isComplete() - Method in class org.jtrim2.image.ImageMetaData
Returns true if the image whose meta data is this ImageMetaData is completely available.

J

JavaIIOMetaData - Class in org.jtrim2.image
Defines the meta data of images retrieved using the ImageIO library of Java.
